name: Lord Magnum's Mental Punishment
description:
This is a 2D platformer that requires Fast Reaction and Jumping made in Unity 

This Game wasn't Made for  Platformer Beginners  so it will make You Very Frustated due to the sudden difficulty curve  but 
thats the Great Bitter Sweet Of The Game

I orginally didnt have the idea ...To be Honest it happened during my Break [i had taken a Rest after i made the Pong Game]
   A buddy of mine On Discord asked me to help him to fix His WallJumpingPlayer Script based on BTP's video on WallJumping(if you are reading this.Thanks Bro)
  People who have Helped me Throughout this Game , i just wanna say Thanks Alot to the following;
*jus cavili
*Plompenz
 *Delannoy
*Harsh Arora
*Black Thorn Prod
..etc
Well I hope You have Fun Playing My Game..at the Comfort of your Own Home...Possibly Today

*_ANNOUNCEMENT_*
>_If  This Game Gets downloaded 20 Times , i will Fully-update The Game(yes_every single Level);

>_The First 5 Comments will be Featured in the Next sudden Update ;

>_I made the Art Game Assests In Unity and Imported Some from KennyAssets.com;

>_I got Music from Bensound.com;

*_ CONTROLS_*
ArrowKeys /WASD --for Movement
Space Bar---Jumping
E---To Open the End Door,when you have Collected 3 Keys
R---Respawn the Player ...incase you die or Fall
Esc---Pause The Game
